name: ninja switch
description:
Ninja switch is a 3d infinite run game with new concept that make it different and unique from other games .
Our game offer a set of 2 characters 'the black and white ninjas' that represent respectively the Yin and the Yang.
Each ninja can do only one specific  task , either jump or turn .So make sure to pick up the right ninja to do the right task.
The black ninja can only jump and the white ninja can only turn left or right .
Ninja switch come with a set of different environments , you can choose one at the main menu before you start playing.

 this game is highly competitive  , so make sure you share it with your friends and enjoy .
